amendment.description: To allocate funds for certain terrorism prevention activities, including rail and transit security.

action.text: Amendment SA 1220 proposed by Senator Gregg to Amendment SA 1205.
Amendment SA 1220 was modified to reflect a first degree status by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 1220 proposed by Senator Gregg.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1220 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 185.
